title: Macedon Ranges Scenic Winery Stay with A$50 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Boutique Tastings
description: Relax and reboot with a countryside winery escape in the glorious Macedon Ranges. Cleveland Estate is surrounded by rolling greenery and leafy vines, with a 19th-century homestead at its heart. Unwind in sophistication with the only underground cellar door in the region, manicured gardens, over 100 acres of vineyards, a small lake and the Carriage House Restaurant serving modern farmhouse cuisine with views across the soaring Macedon Ranges. Soak up the simple pleasures of this boutique escape, exploring the nearby Hanging Rock and Lancefield Farmers' Market or with a revered tasting paddle at the Lost Watering Hole.

title: Victoria Macedon Ranges Boutique Winery Stay with A$50 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Relax and reboot with a countryside winery escape, just an hour from Melbourne’s CBD in the glorious Macedon Ranges. Set on the edge of the historic town of Lancefield, Cleveland Winery is surrounded by rolling greenery and leafy vines, with a 19th-century homestead at its heart. Today, this sleek winery escape offers every modern luxury, with rooms and suites offering views over the estate's vineyards or the charming township.

Unwind in sophistication with the only underground Cellar Door in the region, manicured gardens, over 100 acres of vineyards, a small lake and a restaurant serving modern farmhouse cuisine with views across the soaring Macedon Ranges. Soak up the simple pleasures of this boutique escape, explore the nearby Hanging Rock and Lancefield Farmers' Market or grab a tasting paddle at Holgate Brewhouse.

title: Relaxing Macedon Ranges Winery Stay with Gourmet Inclusions
description: Relax and reboot with a countryside escape, just an hour from the hustle and bustle of Melbourne’s CBD in the glorious Macedon Ranges. Stay at Cleveland Winery and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a picnic hamper with wine, a complimentary wine-tasting experience, guaranteed late checkout until 1pm and discounts on wine and dining.
